name: Cookie Consent
description: Inform your users that you are using cookies

cookie_consent_message.label: The message shown
cookie_consent_message.info: The message shown by the plugin.
cookie_consent_message.value: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website

validation.error_message: You need to provide a message to your visitors. I.e This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website

cookie_consent_dismiss.label: Dismiss button
cookie_consent_dismiss.info: The text used on the dismiss button.

validation.error_message: You need to provide a button text. I.e Got it

cookie_consent_learnmore.label: Learn more link
cookie_consent_learnmore.info: The text shown on the link to the cookie policy.

validation.error_message: You need to provide a text on the cookie policy link. I.e More info

cookie_consent_link.label: Cookie policy link
cookie_consent_link.info: The url of your cookie policy. If its empty, the link is hidden.

cookie_consent_theme.label: Theme
cookie_consent_theme.info: The theme you wish to use.

cookie_consent_path.label: Cookie Path
cookie_consent_path.info: The path for the consent cookie that Cookie Consent uses, to remember that users have consented to cookies. Use to limit consent to a specific path within your website.

validation.error_message: You need to set a valid path for the cookie.

cookie_consent_domain.label: Cookie Domain
cookie_consent_domain.info: The domain for the consent cookie that Cookie Consent uses, to remember that users have consented to cookies. Useful if your website uses multiple subdomains, e.g. if your script is hosted at www.example.com you might override this to example.com, thereby allowing the same consent cookie to be read by subdomains like foo.example.com.

cookie_consent_expirydays.label: Expiry days
cookie_consent_expirydays.info: The number of days Cookie Consent should store the users consent information for. Defaults to 365 days (1 year).

cookie_consent_target.label: Target
cookie_consent_target.info: The target of the link to your cookie policy. Use to open a link in a new window.
